description: This file provides utility functions for synchronizing and persisting files and JSON settings within the Utils namespace. It includes functions for flushing file buffers to disk and storing JSON configuration data.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes a file by opening it, flushing its buffer, calling fsync to force disk write, and closing it.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON value to a file under a specified key, updating the JSON file with the new value and then synchronizing the file to disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
